header.title: Dálvadasa dáiddáris oappáguovttos - Sámi Siida rs

body.p: Registrere epoastačujuhusa vuostáiváldit ođasreivve ja dieđu go giinu cealká.
Gáregasnjárgga skuvlla oahppi Katja Haarla vuittii riikaviidosa tevdnengilvvu, mas galggai sárgut Guolástančurroha oaggumin. Su jumeoabbá Biret fas oaččui gutnemáinnaumi seamma gilvvus.

Logi jahkaas oappaguovttos leaba govvadáiddár guoktá Outi Pieski ja Teuri Haarla nieiddaat. Sii fárrejedje gudajahkásaan Mäntsäläs, mátta-Suomas, Outi áhči riegáđanbáikái Dálvadassii. Skuvlla soai álggaheaibba Gáregasnjárgga sámegielat ovdaskuvllas.

Luondu lea hui dehála oassi jumeguoktá árgabeaivvis. Soai liikoba vánddardit meahcis, ráhkadit visoiid, gorkŋodit muorain ja vádjolit váhnemiinguin duoddaris, dolastallat ja govvet somás doavdagiid luonddus.

Nieiddaguoktás leat ollu buđaldagat ja astoáiggedoaimmat. Soai johtiba dánsumin,nuppi riikkas, Norgga bealde Kárájoga kulturskuvllas. Soai čuojaheaba piano ja dieđusge sárguba hui ollu. Jumeguovttos muitaleaba, ahte hálidivččiiga vel oahppat duddjot vai beasaeaigga goarrut alcceseakka goikkehiid. Áhčči lea maiddái lohpidan oahpahit sunno duddjot muoras.
Oasi geasseluomus soai leaba áhči geassebáikkis Rantasalmis Nuorta-Suomas. Doppe sii lávejit sugadit kájahkkaiguin (indiánaid fanas) Saimaa nammasa jávrri alde ja ijástallat tealttás unna sulloiin.

-In gal ádden vuordit, ahte vuoittain ná stuorra gilvvu. Jurddain, ahte munnos oappáin sáhtaii goappás nu leat vejolavuođat oaut juoidá bálkkaumi. Dat, ahte goabbáge birgii, lei duodáige vuorddekeahtes gutni, dadjá Katja.

Katja muitala, ahte fáddá ii álggos orron nu geasuheamin, muhto barggadettiin addai eanet aht´ eanet somá bargat dainna. Loahpa loahpas orui juo buot somáseamos fáddá, mii skuvlas leama goassige. Dan sárgun orui hui mávssola. Hálidin, ahte tevnnegis addá suohtas ja ”söhtä”. Lean ovdalge sárgon ”söhtä” čurrohiid.

Bálkkaumi geigen Riikkabeai´dálus lei hui gelddolá, erenoamait ballen go mu jearahalle TV:ai. Guolastánbiergasiid lei somá oaut bálkkáupmin, muhto buot stuorámus bálká lea dat go oon sárgut ”Guolástančurroha” j

Jumebeale, Bireha, mielas tevdnengilvvu fáddá lei álggu rájes mielamielde. Son diđii dallánaga maid sáhtaii tevdnet. Váivi lei dat, go nubbi lei geargan sárgut dan maid iege lei smiehttan. Muđui gal lea somá leat jume, go ovtto lea skibir.

-Ledjen gal binnána gáđa, go Katja tevnnegis bargojuvvo dohppehangovva ja maiddái das go son oaui nu ollu ieguđetlágan fuomaumi. Lean gal iege máhttán návddáit iean birgemis, go eaihan lean nu máŋgasat geat oo gutnemáinnaumi, muitala Biret. Su mielas lei erenoama, go dán áis bohciidii nu stuoris, Helsset mátki, luohká reaisu ja vel dan lassin beasaimet Riikkabeaidállui.
Tevdnengilvvus Biret lea oon movtta bargagoahtan sárgunráiddu čurrohiin. Son liiko muđuige sárgut ieguđetlágan divrriid, ee.goppáid, máđuid, ”söhtä” uvlluid ja čurrohiid.

Olu astoáiggebuđaldemiid lassin jumeguoktás reahkká áigi stoahkat ja doaibmat sunno beatnagiin, Turriin. Sámebeana Turri lea nieiddaguoktá čalbmeiella. Sunno mielas Turri lea ”söhtä” ja dájet. Katja ja Biret leaba addán beatnagii buddestatnama ”Tonttupää” (Dontooaivi), muhto rievtti mielde dat lea hui viissis, go máhttá rahpat uvssage.

-Oktii ,go leimme skihpáriid luhtte ija, dat gurppui eadnái munno jiellatduhkorasa dego jearran dihte gos moai leimme, muitaleaba nieiddaguovttos. Turri lea duodaige movtta ja lihkola go, mii leat buohkat čoahkkis.

Ja, mun ges ille1 e1dden maid don Äe1le1t ieÅ¾at bloggii, in oba ddodva ge guÄemuÅ¡ giella lea.. heahpat He1lidin ahte muhtin nieidda blogga maid galggaÅ¡ii mu siiddus, danne mun bidjen su deike vuoikke Äe1lle1 ge de1rogillii. In leat vel oaidne1n buori blogga maid nieida Äe1lle1 se1megillii, evttot munnje jus oainne1t.

Det betyder ung:"Hej, jag e4r ff6r lf6kig ff6r att ha le4rt mig engeslka. Jag borde verkligen klippa mig och skaffa mig ett jobb. Jag borde inte ha byggt paper machie9 djur av ne4v under hela skoltiden. Jag gillar dig."

Ah this article cdouln"t have come on a more right time. I"ve been in the middle of writing my own piece about this. I have been thinking what I really want from my business and how I take on projects. It"s definitely an eye-opener when you think about these things Have a lovely weekend!!

Very simple dish no matetr how much you enjoy food, the food you crave most is something you grow up with. I learned about herring dishes from Sissi in her blogs a couple of times and I enjoyed learning more about it.

Is maith liom sle9ibhte a dhreapadh!There"s a nice hill quite near to Limerick caleld Keeper Hill. It"s nice in that it"s not too tough, but it is a good walk. There"s also Croagh Patrick, for example, which was interesting, especially with really heavy rain up there.I"ll have to pay Cill Mhante1in a better visit.

Stevie Harper thinks i won the ectielon , i can do any single thing i want and there is nothing Canadian taxpayer can do. Stevie might try to replace all government workers using the Temporary Foreign Worker program to to by-pass Canadian workers and substitute with cheap foreign labor All they have to do is say the employees require specialized knowledge .Stephen Harper"s government responded by launching an international lobbying and marketing campaign, in partnership with industry and the Alberta government, to promote the oilsands industry abroad.Stevie Harper isn"t putting corporations before people. He is only putting OIL corporations before people. oil corporation official tell Stevie what to do.The money is just too big for Stevie and his corporate pals to refuse,Canadian taxpayer have zero say . Stevie Harper is George w Bush north. He has the same playbook.Stevie Harper doing everything in his power to dismantle every environmental protection law Canada has created.Enbridge complains that the laws are too onerous". Maybe they are onerous because that is what is required to protect the environment. The laws were put into place for a reason.The Enbridge pipeline is just a part of the this mad rush to fuel the USA and China. The government is jonesing like crazy to push this pipeline through and will try and change whatever legislation that is in the way to show the USA and China that they want to do business regardless of what Canadian taxpayer vote or think Oil wins, the 1% rule the 99% of passive , gullible taxpayers.Really nice how we the BC taxpayers say NO PIPELINE and the politicians we elected do an end around to stick it to us.

He is only putting OIL corporations before people. oil corporation official tell Stevie what to do.The money is just too big for Stevie and his corporate pals to refuse,Canadian taxpayer have zero say . Stevie Harper is George w Bush north. He has the same playbook.Stevie Harper doing everything in his power to dismantle every environmental protection law Canada has created.Enbridge complains that the laws are too onerous". Maybe they are onerous because that is what is required to protect the environment. The laws were put into place for a reason.The Enbridge pipeline is just a part of the this mad rush to fuel the USA and China. The government is jonesing like crazy to push this pipeline through and will try and change whatever legislation that is in the way to show the USA and China that they want to do business regardless of what Canadian taxpayer vote or think Oil wins, the 1% rule the 99% of passive , gullible taxpayers.Really nice how we the BC taxpayers say NO PIPELINE and the politicians we elected do an end around to stick it to us.

E rimelig enig med de6 i den her krkekiitn AM. c6 like og Kulykke, ogse5 fordi e6 kjenne igjen dialogen fra Reinlykke og musikken og konseptet e arti spf8r du me6. Og han "verdden" tel programlederan som har innslag syns e6 og e morsomt. Samtidig se5 syns e6 man ska ve6re LITT meir kritisk for Kc6M man hiv inn pe5 under rulleteksten av folk som ska pe5 tv. Bli flau av det. Einaste som va arti i ge5r va Hilje som be6re satt der og plutselig sa "Bd8". Da flirte e6 godt!

Buorre bargu Lemet. Doivvun dunje burid famuid bggaruin ovddusguvllui. Rabasvuohta lea hui buorre. Lea buorre go bessa lohkat das maid don jurddasat ja maid don dagat. Vuordamusat leat stuorrat. Suoma samediggi lea orru lehkimme oalle vaibbas searvvi man jidna ii gal nu ollu gullu. Dovvuin ahte don nagudat loktet sami jiena vai daht gullu vehas guhklli.

Beautiful Bearwood near Birmingham its NOT in the Black Country in my opinion as I grew up in Bearwood, the Birmingham side and had a Birmingham pocsdote B17 8HE and a Birmingham telephone number BEA 4465 later changed to 429 4465 and I went to school in Birmingham at George Dixon Junior and Infants schools, passed my 11+ and then went to George Dixon Grammar School in City Road, BIRMINGHAM parts of Bearwood ARE in Smethwick as the boundary post at the bottom of Dorset Road/Sycamore Road at the bottom of Willow Avenue off Sandon Road, where we had the family home .the boundary was the brrok that ran at the back of the houses in Willow Avenue, between it and Merrivale Road off Bearwood Road in Smethwick ..!

AFJ. Mandy - I"ve never heard Bryn"s full story of how he came to be with the wild unicorns - maybe that would be a good one for some fan foctiin some time? I"ve not heard tell that any of the animals in Faerie are immortal - but you never know.I don"t think Gabriel was capable of loving anyone at all once he got corrupted and ruined by the Da

AFJ. Mandy - I"ve never heard Bryn"s full story of how he came to be with the wild unicorns - maybe that would be a good one for some fan foctiin some time? I"ve not heard tell that any of the animals in Faerie are immortal - but you never know.I don"t think Gabriel was capable of loving anyone at all once he got corrupted and ruined by the Dark Arts - he just used people for his own ends. I"m pretty sure Tania didn"t really love him at all - a person can fool themselves into thinking they"re in love with someone charismatic and attractive and powerful - and I think she just got swept along by him. But wouldn"t it be creepy if she had loved him a bit and if that love was still inside her, sleeping but able to be woken up?

AFJ. Mandy - I"ve never heard Bryn"s full story of how he came to be with the wild unicorns - maybe that would be a good one for some fan foctiin some time? I"ve not heard tell that any of the animals in Faerie are immortal - but you never know.I don"t think Gabriel was capable of loving anyone at all once he got corrupted and ruined by the Dark Arts - he just used people for his own ends. I"m pretty sure Tania didn"t really love him at all - a person can fool themselves into thinking they"re in love with someone charismatic and attractive and powerful - and I think she just got swept along by him. But wouldn"t it be creepy if she had loved him a bit and if that love was still inside her, sleeping but able to be woken up?
